title: Quarterstaff
content:
In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Someone has carved twenty-seven small lines into the hard wood.

Quarterstaff Location & Where to Find

Location: As a common weapon, they are spawned in various enemies and crates. It is pretty normal to find them. Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dammon at The Hol
